author: Special Correspondent
text:
Culprits broke into the house of a cable operator, Prasheeth, at Rainbow Nagar and took away five sovereigns (jewellery) and cash amounting to Rs. 2,000.

Prasheeth and his wife returned around 11 p.m on Tuesday from a wedding reception on 45-feet road. On Wednesday morning, he found the grill of the window broken open in the ground floor.

Mr. Prasheeth preferred a complaint with the Grand Bazaar police who are investigating.
title: Gold, cash stolen
